name: School Bus Parking Simulator
description:
Test out your driving skills in this extremely addictive and engaging school bus parking game. Exciting game play with steering, gear, accelerator and brakes to control the bus and get it to the required parking locations. Overcome the challenges and collect the rewards!

Features:
* Great for Kids or Adults
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
